purpose: To provide developers with a curated list of resources and tools for creating stateful, multi-actor applications using LangGraph
principle: Aggregates a wide range of projects, libraries, and tools that leverage LangGraph for building complex, multi-actor systems
reusability: Serves as a reference for developers to discover and integrate various LangGraph-related resources into their projects
limitations: Focuses primarily on LangGraph-related resources, may not cover other multi-actor frameworks or technologies comprehensively
name: awesome-LangGraph
